item.description: Building on his success with Michael Timothy’s, Chef Buckley opened his second restaurant – Surf – in 2002 just across the street from the urban bistro. Devoted entirely to creatively prepared and seriously fresh seafood, Surf continues the tradition of excellence set by Chef Buckley. Surf has been voted Best Seafood Restaurant in the state by New Hampshire Magazine’s Readers Poll numerous times. (603) 595-9293

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Dinner @ Surf Restaurant-Nashua
